issue.title: Remove Bit type as it is redundant with boolean
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-254](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-254). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The only use of Bit is for the nullability (or validity) vector which is best understood as a boolean type.
We should remove it as it is not used otherwise.
